Models¶

class bhp_visit.models.base_window_period_item.BaseWindowPeriodItem(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_uuid_model.BaseUuidModel

Base Model of fields that define a window period, either for visits or forms.

Parameters:
  • time_point (IntegerField) – Time point
  • base_interval (IntegerField) – Interval from base timepoint 0 as an integer.
  • base_interval_unit (CharField) – Base interval unit
  • lower_window (IntegerField) – Window lower bound
  • lower_window_unit (CharField) – Lower bound units
  • upper_window (IntegerField) – Window upper bound
  • upper_window_unit (CharField) – Upper bound units
  • grouping (CharField) – Grouping
is_in_window_period(new_datetime, reference_datetime)[source]¶

Checks if new_datetime is within the scheduled visit window period.

class bhp_visit.models.membership_form.MembershipForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_uuid_model.BaseUuidModel

Model to list forms to be linked to a ShceduleGroup as “registration” forms to that group

Name :

membership form
Table :

bhp_visit_membershipform
Parameters:
  • content_type_map_id (OneToOneField) – Content type map
  • category (CharField) – In lowercase, this should be a valid subject type (as in registered_subject).
  • visible (BooleanField) – If not visible on the dashboard, you have to write code to populate it yourself.
class bhp_visit.models.schedule_group.ScheduleGroup(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_uuid_model.BaseUuidModel

Model that groups membership forms

Name :

schedule group
Table :

bhp_visit_schedulegroup
Parameters:
  • group_name (CharField) – Group name
  • membership_form_id (ForeignKey) – Membership form
  • grouping_key (CharField) – may specify a common value to group a number of membership forms so that when one of the group is keyed, the others are no longer shown.
  • comment (CharField) – Comment
class bhp_visit.models.visit_definition.VisitDefinition(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bhp_visit.models.base_window_period_item.BaseWindowPeriodItem

Model to define a visit code, title, windows, schedule_group, etc.

Name :

visit definition
Table :

bhp_visit_visitdefinition

  • base_interval (IntegerField) – Interval from base timepoint 0 as an integer.
  • base_interval_unit (CharField) – Base interval unit

  • lower_window_unit (CharField) – Lower bound units
  • upper_window (IntegerField) – Window upper bound
  • upper_window_unit (CharField) – Upper bound units
  • grouping (CharField) – Grouping
  • code (CharField) – Code
  • title (CharField) – Title
  • instruction (TextField) – Instructions
